entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:00 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
